definition: rising tone (phonetics, e.g. on a question in English)
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The paper studies the rise-levelling technology of heavy carrier.
sentences.chinese: 研究了重型载体的升调平技术。

sentences.english: Arising tone can not be used here.
sentences.chinese: 相比看北京病假条这儿不能用升调。

sentences.english: Arising tone can not use here.
They arranged a farewell reception for John, who had been transferred to the head office.
sentences.chinese: 他们为升调到总部的约翰安排了一个欢送会。

sentences.english: In English, some questions have a rising inflection.
sentences.chinese: 在英语中有些疑问句需要用升调。

sentences.english: Read these sentences, paying attention to the rising tune.
sentences.chinese: 朗读这些句子，注意用升调。

sentences.english: Listen to these sentences spoken first with rising and then with falling intonation.
sentences.chinese: 听以下的先是升调然后是降调的句子。

sentences.english: Questions are spoken with a rising intonation.
sentences.chinese: 疑问句是以升调说出来的。

sentences.english: I beg your pardon. I didn't catch you just now .
sentences.chinese: 强调时用升调，意为“请再说一便”，表示没听清楚。

sentences.english: The third tone is a long low tone plus a short rising tone.
sentences.chinese: 第三声由长降调和短升调组成。

definition: falling intonation (linguistics)/to lower the key of a tune/to demote
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
an octave lower (music)
solfege
(music) to change key/modulation/(of an employee) to be transferred to another post

imperative sentence
to transpose (music)
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation

declarative sentence
tone mark on a Chinese syllable (i.e. accents on ā á ǎ à)/(music) key signature
